page.title: 05Recreation
page.content: {Television- Children today prefer to watch cartoons."Tom and Jerry" is a firm favourite."He Man", an adventure cartoon is also popular.Adventure programmes are also popular especially with the younger children with American imports like "Knight Rider" and "A Team" being most favoured. Fictional programmes are more popular than factual ones across the age group 4-11 years. {Indoor Games With children aged 4-7 years the most popular games were cards, guess who, mouse trap and snakes and ladders. With children aged 7-11 years the most popular games were cards, snooker, chess, monopoly and guess who. {Outdoor Games} With children aged 4-7 catch,hopscotch ,7-11 football,tennis, rounders
